title: Update a reservation
description: Update an existing BigQuery reservation to change its properties, such as its slot capacity.

objective.narrative: Developers often need to programmatically adjust their BigQuery resource allocations. This sample provides a clear example of how to update a reservation's slot capacity using the BigQuery Reservation API, which is useful for dynamic resource management and cost optimization.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_reservation_update
regionTags.title: Update a reservation
regionTags.description: Update an existing BigQuery reservation to change its properties, such as its slot capacity.
